com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin

Class AdminCompanyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin.AdminCompanyController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin/company")
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service")
public class AdminCompanyController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements a set of methods for working with main ModelAndView objects and object of Company class or subclasses for admins. Class methods create and return modelsAndView, depending on the request.
    See Also:
    Company, CompanyService, PhotoService, AdminMVFabric

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CompanyService companyService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Company class.
      private MainMVFabric fabric
      The implementation of the interface provides a set of standard methods for creates and returns the main modelAndViews.

                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String googleMaps,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="logo_photo")
                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile logo,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="logo_action")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String logoAction,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="favicon_photo")
                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile favicon,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="favicon_action")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String faviconAction,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="slides[]")
                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] slides,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="slides_action")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String slidesAction,
                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        Updates and save the main company and redirects by url /admin/company/main. Request mapping: /admin/article/update/main Method: POST
        Parameters:
        title - a new title to the main company.
        domain - a new domain to the main company.
        tagline - a new tagline to the main company.
        description - a new description to the main company.
        advantages - a new advantages to the main company.
        information - a new information to the main company.
        keywords - a new keywords to the main company.
        workTimeFrom - a new start work time to the main company.
        workTimeTo - a new finish work time to the main company.
        mobilePhone - a new mobile phone to the main company.
        landlinePhone - a new landline phone to the main company.
        fax - a new fax to the main company.
        email - a new e-mail to the main company.
        senderEmail - a new sender e-mail to the main company.
        senderPass - a new sender password to the main company.
        vkontakte - a new vkontakte url to the main company.
        facebook - a new facebook url to the main company.
        twitter - a new twitter url to the main company.
        skype - a new skype username to the main company.
        address - a new address to the main company.
        googleMaps - a new google maps url to the main company.
        logo - a new file of logo to the main company.
        logoAction - a action on the logo.
        favicon - a new file of favicon to the main company.
        faviconAction - a action on the favicon.
        slides - a files of slides to the main company.
        slidesAction - a new title to the main company.
        modelAndView - a object of class ModelAndView for to update.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
        See Also:
        Company, Photo

      • updateMainCompany

        @RequestMapping(value="/update/main",
                method=GET)
public void updateMainCompany()
                                                                                           throws org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException
        The method throws an exception in the case of reference to it. The exception sender: "GET method in "/admin/company/update/main" is not supported!" Request mapping: /admin/company/update/main Method: POST
        Throws:
        org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException - thrown when an error occurs reading the mapping between object and datastore.

        Adds new company and redirects by url /admin/company/{url}. Request mapping: /admin/company/add Method: POST
        Parameters:
        title - a title of the new company.
        domain - a domain of the new company.
        tagline - a tagline of the new company.

        Updates and save the company with url and redirects by url /admin/company/{url}. Request mapping: /admin/company/update Method: POST
        Parameters:
        url - a url of the company to update.
        title - a new title to the company.
        domain - a new domain to the company.
        tagline - a new tagline to the company.
        description - a new description to the company.
        advantages - a new advantages to the company.
        information - a new information to the company.
        keywords - a new keywords to the company.
        mobilePhone - a new mobile phone to the company.
        landlinePhone - a new landline phone to the company.
        fax - a new fax to the company.
        email - a new e-mail to the company.
        vkontakte - a new vkontakte url to the company.
        facebook - a new facebook url to the company.
        twitter - a new twitter url to the company.
        skype - a new skype username to the company.
        address - a new address to the company.
        googleMaps - a new google maps url to the company.
        logoFile - a new file of logo to the company.
        logoAction - a action on the logo.
        isValid - a validated of the article.
        modelAndView - a object of class ModelAndView for to update.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
        See Also:
